pullRequest.body:
fix: Make `rightInverse_inv` use `RightInverse`.

---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

nodes.body:
Is this ready for review? If yes, please add the `awaiting-review` label.
I see that you have other PRs open without any labels: if you don't mark them as ready for review, it's likely nobody will look at them (or even see they exist, as they wont appear on the reviewing queue).

(this PR looks good, and I will merge it, but I want to be sure you saw that message first)

Note: I have pushed an update to the lean toolchain because this PR was on a [buggy version](https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/113488-general/topic/Potential.20data.20loss.20from.20.60lake.20clean.60.20with.204.2E2.2E0-rc2.2F3/near/397875701) of the toolchain. **WARNING**: checking out old commits of this PR using v4.2.0-rc2 or v4.2.0-rc3 can cause `lake clean` to delete your mathlib folder! If you need to do so, make sure to delete `lakefile.olean` manually before running any `lake` commands.

> Is this ready for review? If yes, please add the `awaiting-review` label. I see that you have other PRs open without any labels: if you don't mark them as ready for review, it's likely nobody will look at them (or even see they exist, as they wont appear on the reviewing queue).
> 
> (this PR looks good, and I will merge it, but I want to be sure you saw that message first)

 @RemyDegenne Yes, I should have added that label before and have done so now.  Thanks!

Pull request successfully merged into master.

  Build succeeded!

Is this ready for review? If yes, please add the `awaiting-review` label.
I see that you have other PRs open without any labels: if you don't mark them as ready for review, it's likely nobody will look at them (or even see they exist, as they wont appear on the reviewing queue).

(this PR looks good, and I will merge it, but I want to be sure you saw that message first)

Note: I have pushed an update to the lean toolchain because this PR was on a [buggy version](https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/113488-general/topic/Potential.20data.20loss.20from.20.60lake.20clean.60.20with.204.2E2.2E0-rc2.2F3/near/397875701) of the toolchain. **WARNING**: checking out old commits of this PR using v4.2.0-rc2 or v4.2.0-rc3 can cause `lake clean` to delete your mathlib folder!
